name: Selection Sort
description: During each scan of the unsorted elements in the array. Select the smallest value and add it to the sorted section.

name: Heap Sort
description: Add elements one by one to the heap section of the array. Then remove the root of the heap and add it to the sorted section before reheapifying.

name: Insertion Sort
description: Select an arbitrary element from the unsorted section of the array and search through the sorted portion to determine where to add the element.

name: QuickSort
description: Choose a pivot and recursively sort the elements into two lists as smaller than pivot or larger than pivot.
